security.title: Security
security.sub_title: Please store recovery phrase in a physically separate, offline environment. This is the only way to reset your password and access your wallet.
security.address_hint: Address (Public key) is used for user identification, it can be freely shared, allowing users to verify digital signatures.
security.private_key_hint: Private key is a secret key. It is the only way to decrypt the encrypted data. You might need this to transfer your funds to other wallets.
security.recovery_phrase_hint: Recovery phrase contains 16 words in a specific order. This is the only way to reset your password! Your PBQ tokens can’t be recovered without it.

editor.title: Every story should have a title. Make it a good one.
editor.headline: Here you can put the main idea of your story.
editor.content: Type your story here, add images or videos.
editor.cover: Choose a cover photo for your story. Once added, you can edit the image.
editor.tags: Add at least 1 keyword, describing your story the best.
editor.thumbnail: Choose an image to highlight your story among others.
editor.source: It is appreciated if you mention the link of the source.
editor.publication: Please choose a Publication if your story is suitable for a certain one.
editor.adults: Let readers know that your story is appropriate for adults only.
editor.publish: Publish once your story is ready or finish it later, don’t worry, it is automatically saved in Drafts.
